subject: College Athletics
Football
Heisman Trophy
lead_paragraph: Saturday’s Red River Rivalry, as the annual game between Oklahoma and Texas in Dallas at the Cotton Bowl is known, marks the return of national title and Heisman Trophy implications to the bitter series.
snippet: Saturday’s Red River Rivalry, as the annual game between Oklahoma and Texas in Dallas at the Cotton Bowl is known, marks the return of national title and Heisman Trophy implications to the bitter series.
